body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! My name is Philip Long, and I'm here to assist you on behalf of Supreme Escape Rooms. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, hello Philip. My name is Jacqueline Taylor.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jacqueline. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having an issue with a recent purchase from your escape room. I need help with a return.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues, Jacqueline. To assist you further, may I have your order number and the date of purchase, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the order number is FIVE FIVE FOUR THREE, and the purchase date was March Twenty-Second.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. Let me quickly look up your order... Done. I see the problem here. We will sort this out for you. Can I confirm your email address, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you Jacqueline. I've initiated the return process. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you so much for your help, Philip. I appreciate it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jacqueline. It's been my pleasure helping you. Thank you for choosing Supreme Escape Rooms. Have a great day!
